name: GetShapeSize

returns.name: xsize
returns.desc: Size in voxels along x axis

returns.name: ysize
returns.desc: Size in voxels along y axis

returns.name: zsize
returns.desc: Size in voxels along z axis

returns.name: scale
returns.desc: The size of one voxel in meters (with default scale it is 0.1)

description: Return the size of a shape in voxels
